Container.Name: Firefly-III
Container.Overview: "Firefly III" is a self-hosted financial manager. It can help you keep track of expenses, income, budgets and everything in between. It supports credit cards, shared household accounts and savings accounts. It’s pretty fancy. You should use it to save and organise money.
Container.DonateText: If you like Firefly and if it helps you save lots of money, why not send me a dime for every dollar saved. This is a joke, although the Paypal form works just fine, try it!

Port.Description: When updating this value, also update the WebUI value via advanced view.

Volume.Description: Where firefly stores the file from a report that is exported.
Where firefly stores the uploaded files that are used for bulk importing data.

Variable.Name: APP_KEY
Variable.Description: CHANGE! Random value of exactly 32 characters. Used to encrypt the database. Cannot be changed later on. Make sure you dont lose the key!

Variable.Name: DB_CONNECTION
Variable.Description: mysql or empty when using PostgreSQL

Variable.Name: DB_DATABASE
Variable.Description: Name of the database where firefly can store its data

Variable.Name: DB_USERNAME
Variable.Description: Username that is allowed to connect and edit the firefly database

Config.Name: Host path 1
Config.Description: Container Path: /var/www/firefly-iii/storage/export - Where firefly stores the file from a report that is exported.

Config.Name: Host Path 2
Config.Description: Container Path: /var/www/firefly-iii/storage/upload - Where firefly stores the uploaded files that are used for bulk importing data.

Config.Name: Host Port 1
Config.Description: Container Port: 80 - When updating this value, also update the WebUI value via advanced view.

Config.Name: APP_KEY
Config.Description: Container Variable: APP_KEY - CHANGE! Random value of exactly 32 characters. Used to encrypt the database. Cannot be changed later on. Make sure you dont lose the key!

Config.Name: DB_CONNECTION
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_CONNECTION - mysql or empty when using PostgreSQL

Config.Name: DB_DATABASE
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_DATABASE - Name of the database where firefly can store its data

Config.Name: DB_USERNAME
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_USERNAME - Username that is allowed to connect and edit the firefly database

Config.Name: DB_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Container Variable: DB_PASSWORD - Password for the DB_USERNAME

Config.Name: LOG_CHANNEL
Config.Description: Container Variable: LOG_CHANNEL - Required when using MariaDB

Container.Description: "Firefly III" is a self-hosted financial manager. It can help you keep track of expenses, income, budgets and everything in between. It supports credit cards, shared household accounts and savings accounts. It’s pretty fancy. You should use it to save and organise money.
